author: Parizo, Eric
title: Digital Guardian Acquires Code Green Networks to Take on DLP Giants Symantec, Intel Security
text: October 07, 2015 Rate this report Intelligence Alert After two-plus years of turmoil, Digital Guardianâ€™s acquisition of Code Green Networks represents an epic turnaround, positioning it to expand into the SMB realm with a low-cost offering and finally take on DLP giants Symantec and Intel Security.
